meanings: shooting down, bringing down(지상에서), 격추하다 shoot ((airplanes)) down, bring down, down (a plane)
Verb to be shot down, be brought down

vlive.korean: 왕으로 바둑돌을 하나 격추시켰습니다. He just pushed a go stone off the table. 듣기 View video QUEEN : 제 1회 퀸씨배 인디알까기 최강자전 2화 <8강전 A>
vlive.english: He just pushed a go stone off the table.

examples.korean: They took out two enemy bombers. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그들이 적군 폭격기 두 대를 없앴다[격추했다]. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: They took out two enemy bombers. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Several planes were shot down by enemy fire. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 적의 발포로 몇 대의 비행기가 격추되었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Several planes were shot down by enemy fire. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Twelve enemy fighters had been brought down. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 12대의 적기가 이미 격추된 상태였다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Twelve enemy fighters had been brought down. Add to Wordbook
